name: Project Manager
description:
An international fintech company is looking to hire a specialist for a position of IT Project Manager in Limassol (Cyprus)

In the course of work, you will cooperate with the CTO, CEO, our developer team, and key business units in order to deliver into all operational processes of the Company

We’re expecting a thoughtful and impactful approach, a detailed understanding of business needs, and sound logic in making decisions

Responsibilities:

  • Discovering, specifying, and analyzing the requirements for the development of new functionality and modification of existing ones
  • Organizing decentralized tasks for the development and implementation of new features for fintech products
  • Prioritizing tasks based on their business importance
  • Developing functional and other requirements and specifications appropriate for the system architecture
  • Creating work specifications and distributing them among tasks
  • Monitoring of task completion time and correspondence of results and work specifications
  • Participating in testing and handing the product over to a client
  • Organizing efficient communication between managers, developers, technical specialists, and clients

Required skills and experience:

  • Higher technical education
  • Work experience in a similar position for at least 2 years
  • Operational mindset and broad-based knowledge in the IT sphere
  • Knowledge of software and web architecture design principles
  • Accuracy, attention to details, ability to set out your ideas clearly, structure and organize information
  • Experience in creating work specifications and software modules documentation
  • Experience in using task trackers (JIRA or similar)
  • at least Intermediate English

Will be considered as an advantage:

  • Skills in Business process modeling tools
  • Knowledge of project management procedures
  • Practical experience in developing on one of the high-level programming languages
  • Experience in developing financial or payment systems

We will provide:

  • Realization of your engineering abilities in real business tasks
  • Direct communication with Company management for finding the best decisions
  • Opportunity to choose methods and tools necessary for your work

Job conditions:

  • Attractive monthly salary paid in line with your skills and experience
  • Performance bonuses
  • A comfortable office in the center of Limassol (Cyprus)
  • Medical insurance for our employees and their families
  • Access to professional training, conferences, and paid educational courses
  • Different corporate events
  • Sports events
  • Assistance in relocation and visa processing (if necessary)

Data sharing consent

By sending this application I hereby give consent for my personal data included in my application (such as name, contacts, work experience and any other additional information) to be processed by the receiving side (RoboMarkets LTD, Limassol, Αρχ. Μακαρίου ΙΙΙ, 169-171) for purposes of the recruitment process.

We kindly inform you that the above consents can be withdrawn at any time by sending an e-mail from the e-mail address provided in your application. You have the right to access, correct, modify, update, rectify, request for the transfer or deletion of data, withdrawal of consent or objection.

We will continue to hold and process your data for as long as necessary to consider you for employment and for a reasonable period of time as is necessary for document compliance with local laws in the country where the opportunity is located.
